CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Tax__r.FlexBoard__c) || ISBLANK(Tax__r.FlexHead__c), "--", IF( (Tax__r.FlexBoard__c + 0.0001) < 0.1, "0" & TEXT(ROUND((Tax__r.FlexBoard__c + 0.0001) * 100, 2)), TEXT(ROUND((Tax__r.FlexBoard__c + 0.0001) * 100, 2)) ) & "% At√© " & IF( Tax__r.FlexHead__c < 0.1, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(Tax__r.FlexHead__c * 100, 2)), TEXT(ROUND(Tax__r.FlexHead__c * 100, 2)) ) & "%" )
CustomField.label: Director
